评论概述: Absolutely stunning! Two very enthusiastic thumbs up!
评论详情: I am in love with this dress. It's gorgeous and flattering, and when I wear it I can't take 5 steps without someone stopping me to tell me how much they love it. I was worried about the sizing because I'm short and curvy, but I ordered a 4x and hoped for the best. I am so glad I did! The wrap style is super forgiving and does a good job of hiding a bit of a post c-section pooch. I'm a triple-d and never expected to be able to wrap the top all the way over my chest, but it still looks perfect open in the front over a cami, and adding a wide belt is the final perfect touch. Unlike the vast majority of these types of dresses, that tend to be made in Asian sizes and run far smaller than we hope, the upper arms of this dress are actually surprisingly roomy without being frumpy or matronly. That has been a constant source of frustration for me and a lot of other women who take a gamble on these dresses and tops; 9 times out of 10 when you finally find one that fits well everywhere else, it will still be ridiculously tight in the arms. But not this dress! And there is enough material in the skirt for both sides to reach the opposite hip; since I already can't close the top I'm going to try another pattern in a 3x. There are some other colors/patterns that I like that aren't available in the 4x, so I'm going to try a smaller one and see how it works. When I do, I'll update this review and include pictures of both.  The one thing that isn't ideal is how long this is; it puddles up on the ground when I'm barefoot or in flats, but a pair of high heeled boots fixed that right up. I'm 5'3" tall and the boots have a 2 1/2 inch heel, and the skirt brushed the tops of the toes. Be warned though: I'm well endowed on top and also have a legendary ghetto booty. That helps to hold the dress up another inch or two. But please trust me when I tell you how gorgeous this dress is, and for the price it's absolutely worth it if you need to hem it or twist it once under a belt.  A final warning: not all of the dresses shown here are the same. I'm reviewing the dusky purple dress with long bell sleeves. All of the dresses with those sleeves are the same, size-wise. But the ones with short sleeves are TINY. I'm talking size 0 tiny. Like doll clothes. So be careful which color you order! If you get the right dress I know you'll love it as much as I do. Two very enthusiastic thumbs up!

This dress was everything I was hoping for. It is so flattering. I feel so beautiful in it. I am 5’3, And wear between a size 12 and 14. I wear a 38 DD bra. I will have to wear a tank top just for the bust area. It fits so perfectly everywhere else but is too revealing of my bra, and it was too tight to pin it closed. But I am busty so that’s kind of to be expected in a dress with no stretch, especially when it fits in the waist. But that’s why I love this dress so much. There is no stretch. It lays very flat, and it doesn’t cling to my mom belly. It’s not transparent at all. I read some reviews where it said it was completely see-through, and I am so grateful to say that mine is completely solid and there is no transparency whatsoever. The length is perfect, you could wear it with a short wedge, but I’m going to wear it with flat sandals, because it hits just at the floor maybe a half inch above. I like my dresses long, and this is perfect because it’s not dragging on the ground.  I bought it to wear to a wedding in Georgia in early May. It is just perfect. I have a lot of tattoos that I wanted to cover and this is romantic, feminine, flattering, and it covers everything without it looking like I’m trying to cover everything. If I could give this dress more than five stars I would. I am so glad that my search for the perfect dress for this wedding is over. I can see myself wearing this on dinner dates for years to come. Extremely happy with this purchase.

~5’5”/145lbs LOVE thIs true “Maxi” dress to wear to a 70’s birthday party. It truly reaches the floor at my height/weight. ~Fabric is light for summer but not shear good for warm weather dress or light cardigan over plain summer dresses ~Love the bell sleeves, vintage pattern and ruffled hem ~Yeah, can’t see my size C bra but dear hubby promptly observed, “Nice cleavage!” So there will be a broach, snap or camisole for 62y hen ~Took off 1 star because did not receive Lake Blue/symmetrical print. This may explain why this dress is noted for a high return rate. Actual colors are navy/turquoise/pink/dark gold ~I like enough to keep and wear in warm weather.

This seller has really nice maxi dresses, hope they keep carrying more of these styles. Ok, this dress is true to size. I’m 38B on top, 5’3 in height and I weigh 140 pounds. The dress goes down to your feet but not to the floor. The dress flows nicely, non transparent in this blue turquoise print, fabric is light and it’s not stretchy. If your 36/38 around the bust area, go with the large. Always go with your bust size when it’s a wrap dress because it determines the weith of your back and if the fabric is not stretchy, you won’t get away with a medium. I have a tiny waist and that part of any dress is always adjustable. It’s your back, chest and shoulders that determine your correct fit. So anyone 36 to 38 is a large. 39 to40 XL and 34 to 36 a medium and a small anywhere bellow is a small. If you don’t have a flat stomach, keep in mind you will have less fabric to wrap around you and your slit will be more open, but it will still look nice and sexy. You can dress up or dress down this dress. It’s beautiful and I received many compliments. Hope this information helped.

评论概述: Sewing Flaw or for Busty women only?
评论详情: The dress overall is really nice and it fit everywhere except the bust area.  It was simply way too big!  I ordered a small, but there was no tag on the inside to see if they sent the right size.  I believe it was a small as it fit everywhere else and any smaller, it would be too tight on my shoulders.  Not sure if this is just a flaw with this particular dress, because from the reviews and the pics from others who have purchased it, it appears you don't have to have large breasts to wear this.  Don't normally have issues with the chest area with wrap dresses and I thought I would be able to simply adjust and tighten the wrap, but nothing worked.  In fact it seems like if the hole was in a different location, I would be able to adjust it.  So I'm wondering if this is a flaw in this dress, particularly because there was no tag on the inside and the dress arrived earlier than the delivery dates given.  Very disappointed because I love the dress and it looked really awesome on everyone I saw it on....both small and large busted.  Now I must wait 48hrs to see if the seller will "approve" a return.  Not happy about that at all and wish I had known that before ordering.  Should not have to wait for a seller's "approval" if something doesn't fit!  Will think twice before ordering from this seller again.

I absolutely loved everything about this dress. It is sexy, the fabric is comfortable and it is well-made. Unfortunately, I had to return it because it is extremely long. I am only f’2”, this drug the ground by at least 2 inches. I don’t wear heels so it was not wearable for me. Would be perfect for anybody 5 foot five and over.

评论概述: Pretty feminine and perfect for summer
评论详情: I love this dress purchased in the blue, I’m 5”8’ 120 small bust. It’s so flattering, perfect for summer, had tons of compliments 🩷 love it so much I just ordered it in the brown. The quality is nice and I bought a small, UPDATE! Received the brown today and love the print.. however it was delivered in a beat up bag see thru wadded up like TRASH!!! A complete wrinkled MESS like someone else’s return that no one bothered to actually return it in the nice clean zip envelope that all my other 4 dresses from which were folded beautifully to the extent that I was able to wear the white/blue without pressing or steaming… I will keep it and spend the at least 30min ironing it because I actually do love the style and print. GET IT TOGETHER AMAZON!!! A return sent back looking like it was pulled out of somebody’s dirty laundry basket should NEVER JUST BE PASSED ON TO THE NEXT EXCELLENT CUSTOMER!

I love this dress. It is made of a lightweight material, it fits correctly and lays well, and u think it is quite complimentary. The one drawback for me is that the length of the wrap around belt is too short! It is possible to wrap it around as it should, but only leaves several inches of length to secure the belt, not enough for a nice bow. I will work around this as I love the dress, but it’s a simple mistake that u hope they remedy.

Lots & lots of compliments on this one, and I wear dresses often enough, so it’s not just the novelty of wearing a dress that’s earning the nods.. it’s the dress itself.  I did change a few things: 1) I hand-sewed the lower, open front closed from just below the waist, and downward. (Super easy). Now I step into it & still wrap with the ties. I’m not comfortable with a possibly-open front or tall “slit”, plus I was going to be on a high stage for one event, so I don’t need people staring up the dress. 2) I wear a cami under it, because otherwise it would plunge quite low. I’ve done navy or white, but the white looks best. I may permanently sew in a white mock-camisole (again, super easy for the non-sewer… I kinda make it up as I go) 3) I’m not a fan of the flare sleeves. They just get in my way. So far I haven’t changed them, and it’s been ok. But I plan to get rid of the flares… perhaps convert into a long sleeved ballon sleeve. I might have to get help figuring that out.  Washing is easy in washer or by hand. Don’t put it in the dryer. The rayon will shrink. But the nice thing about the rayon: it makes for an easy travel dress. Stuff it in your bag (takes up little space), pull it out, hang, spray with some water. Then either let it hang overnight or give the damp dress a few straightening rugs & the wrinkles come out easily, then dry quickly.  Very lightweight & breezy. Fun when the wind catches it a little. The lightweight-ness and ease of getting rid of wrinkles are the positives, if the trade off is a fabric made of plastic (rayon). But honestly, nothing else is as breezy as rayon. Sigh. So one smash-hit in my closet will be ok.  Really like the colors & pattern. A little boho style, but it really seems to work with most people. Favorite dress in about 5 years!

评论概述: Ajuste perfecto, gran funcionalidad para un vestido sexy!
评论详情: Quiero explicar porque escogí este vestido-kimono dentro de tantos que hay en Amazon: buscaba un Kimono principalmente para usar en la playa, largo hasta el piso (sin que arrastrara) de mangas largas pero que no fueran estilo murcielago, de una tela liviana, fresca y con un estampado en tonos azules que no fuera escandaloso, fácil del combinar. No quería algo muy costoso, pues basándome en que los kimonos son prendas de construcción bastante sencilla, suelen quedar sueltos, anchos y que el objetivo principal es la playa pues no estaba dispuesta a pagar mucho dinero. Y si además era lo bastante bonito como para usar de forma casual sobre ropa como un short o incluso un jeans, estaría perfecto para mi. Pues este Kimono-vestido de Amazón es todas esas cosas, las cumple a la perfección. Una vez lo tuve en mi mano y me lo probé, comprobé que es perfecto, porque además queda muy bien, realmente se ve muy bonito, esta funcionalidad adicional que tiene de poder usarlo como un vestido de verano es un gran plus para mí. En cuanto al producto en sí, el patrón de la tela es muy bonito. Está bien cocido, sin embargo no está bien rematado, los lugares en las costuras donde suele haber más tensión les hace falta un buen remate para evitar que las costuras se deshagan. Y hay algo que deseo aclarar: este es un producto “económico” si estás buscando calidad en los detalles este no es el producto para ti y te explico porque: 1. El final de las mangas no tiene un dobladillo, tiene una costura de overlook, que puede parecer un poco rústica. Esto es igual para el borde del vestido (ver fotos anexas). 2. El vestido tiene un corte, en donde hay una unión de la tela que no es simétrico (ver fotos anexas) 3. El patrón del estampado puede verse un poco torcido en la parte superior de la espalda (foto) y en la parte de abajo por detras del vestido en donde esta la unión de las dos piezas (fotos). Para mi sigue siendo un buen producto que cumple con lo que yo estaba buscando, a pesar de esos detalles se ve muy bien (es por eso que no lo doy 5 estrellas), realmente no son detalles que hagan ver la pieza mal. Ademas el ajuste es perfecto, yo soy talla S, tengo de busto 34C y mido 1,59 mts y me quedo perfecto, el largo de las mangas y el ancho es perfecto, el escote queda ideal, igualmente el largo del vestido es el apropiado, es largo hasta el piso sin arrastrarse y la abertura enfrente hace ver un poco las piernas sin mostrar demasiado y eso hace lucir muy sexy… Por ultimo puedo decir que el proveedor en China fue muy amable. Me vi en la necesidad de contactarlo porque el pedido quedo retenido en China justo cuando declararon la emergencia mundial por el Covid y me indicó que el producto llegaría sin problema una vez que abrieran los aeropuertos y así fue.

The medium fits better around the front better but I prefer the more white dress pattern .  They don't have a medium in the white .. notice how skimpy the top is and I have zero chest . I think it's flattering but the white may be see through ?

It isn't Magenta/Navy & Blue at all.  I guess the parts that are supposed to be Navy are more Black.  I can already see that I'll need to either wear a bodysuit or a cami & boyshorts underneath or I might feel too exposed.  Either that or I may stitch two panels together and step in like another buyer suggested.  But I like the style and for the money, I have no complaints.
Colors are way better in person  Dress is awesome
It’s not a terrible dress but it is not what they are advertising it as. It is very poorly cut and the fabric is not as pictured in the advertisement
Kind of cheaply made with a very thin fabric but soft and silky!!

评论概述: Pretty color - wrap tie is awkwardly placed
评论详情: This blue dress M is prettier on than expected. Also tried a different color and larger size but it was too long and it wasn’t as flattering.  The wrap tie is a little too high for my short frame so I quick-stitch the top and bottom closed, or alter the ties and move them down. Might wear it over a body suit or shorts since the split is more in the middle than on the side. It’s a pretty color and I like the sleeves so for me it would be worth it. Cute with a belt (no belt included.)  Fabric is light and comfortable.

I’m 5’3 and 140. I got a medium and it’s sooooo cute!!! And comfortable! It fits perfectly! I would definitely recommend. I would say the material is more whiter on the inside and not translucent or the same pattern as it is on the front though. Either way I’m obsessed with it and it still looks great!

It’s a pretty dress but not at all what I was wanting. I’ve had this dress saved for a long time and finally decided to get it. Due to the lighting of the photo, I thought the dress was a deep red. I was really disappointed when I got the dress and it was pink. I should have looked more thoroughly at the reviews.

评论概述: Super flattering, but hard to sit in!
评论详情: I didn’t read the description or reviews closely when I ordered this and didn’t realize it was a wrap dress. The dress was super flattering and I loved it when I was standing. When I was sitting, the dress opened pretty high up in the center of my body and I felt like I had to put something on my lap. I’ll definitely wear it again, but probably to an event with a lot of standing.

评论概述: Wasn't happy with the XL fit
评论详情: I'm 5'6' on a good day, long torso, shorter legs.  The length was fairly spot on my ankle, but I would have liked a little more length especially for an XL.  The arms felt tight.  The wrap around part was fine, but the center part felt like it was missing something. Even when I added a belt I still didn't like the look.  I tried walking down the stairs with this tied as it should and the entire dress blew open on multiple occasions just during try-on.  Had an odder shape or maybe it's just my body.  I would have liked the next size up if that was an option possibly.  Returned.
this is the most comfortable dress i have found in a long time.  I normally hate wrap around dresses but this one I loved.

评论概述: Underwhelmed but Hoping for the Best
评论详情: I've been eyeing this dress for a while, but when I finally got it, I was underwhelmed. It might just not be flattering on my body type. As a result, it's moved down on my list of choices for after-party event. However, I do love the colors, and I'm holding onto it in hopes that it grows on me as much as it did in the image.

评论概述: Beautiful dress but just a little short
评论详情: I ordered this dress for a photoshoot with a boho type theme.. boho is not my natural style so I was really out of my comfort zone so I ordered a handful of dresses and this was my favorite.  It's a beautiful dress and it wraps around you like a robe so you don't have to worry so much about the sizing.  My only complaint and why I took off a star is is because it was too short for me.. I am 5'9 which is taller than average and this is a common problem for me but I usually hate dresses that aren't long enough and think they look goofy but it didn't bother me as much as usual with this dress, I still felt it fit well enough and didn't look ridiculious so I still wore it.. I think it looks a little longe rin the second photo because my leg is bent but the first photo is a good representation of the length on me, I do think it would be long enough for most people!!

评论概述: I want to love it but I don’t
评论详情: It’s alright. Maybe it’s because I’m tall (5’9) and it’s a few inches above the ground. It’s not awful, but it doesn’t have the vibe I was hoping for. It’s a wrap dress, so you can make it more fitter at the ribs, which I liked… but the dress and the sleeves were just a little too short. It didn’t have as flowy as a vibe as I wanted. Again, not bad. Thin but decent fabric. I will be returning it.

评论概述: It's cute, uncommon, long, sexy in a classy way, and very reasonably priced.
评论详情: What I like is that it's cute, uncommon, long, sexy in a classy way, and very reasonably priced. I've only worn it once, so far, and received a number of compliments from other women...I was with my husband. I'm about 5' 8 1/2" 183 lbs 36DD & 12-14. I purchased a regular XL. It's the purple/gray one, but the color is less purple and more hot pinkish...like most of the Amazon item pics. Regarding modesty, I don't at all like showing my cleavage, so I wore a tank underneath. Also, when I sat down, my legs (from the ankle...all the way up) were on FULL display, so I found myself manually covering them with one side of the dress. What I don't like is the sleeve length. I LOVE the sleeve length depicted in their picture, but the model in the pic must be short or have short arms, because my sleeves hit just above my wrists. :( I'd definitely prefer longer sleeves, but I'm keeping the dress.  3yr UPDATE (pic w/boots): I now weigh 149 lbs & wore this dress today. I received multiple compliments about how pretty my dress is. The waist was swimming on me, so I wrapped the sash to my back, then tied it at my side… that made the waist display a great fit; the right belt would’ve worked too. I’d forgotten how gorgeous, light & flowing this dress is. I’m looking forward to ordering a medium soon.

Okay... for $20 I was totally skeptical. I have a photo shoot coming up on the beach and I was looking for something different to wear, but a dress. It’s October so I didn’t want to look like I was stuck in summer or lost in winter. I was definitely skeptical about the fabric and how small it would run. I never order clothes on amazon, but I read the review and said what the hell. LADIES BUY THIS DRESS! It is SUCH a great quality dress for $20! I went up in a size due to the fact it was made in China, I probably could have just stuck with a large (I ordered an XL). So yes, it’s a tad big because I ordered a size up, but it is definitely true to size... but there is nothing wrong with a little extra room.  The colors, are beautiful. I ordered the grey & purple. I am so excited to wear this. I am 5’7, and it does not drag on the ground but ends right near my ankles... it’s cut so it is like that, so you do not look like you’re “ready for the flood”. The material isn’t heavy, but it’s not extremely light either like something you would expect ordered off of amazon from a clothing brand you’ve never heard of. I definitely would not dry this in a drier.  It came packaged in a thick zip loc bag, which was nice... it wasn’t just thrown in cheap plastic.  Also for those of you that don’t know, it’s a wrap dress, so it has to wrap around you (duh). It probably could be worn open too, if you had a cute outfit to go under it.  Just order it. You’ll love it.

This dress is very attractive. It has a nice line, it is very slimming, and it is made very well. The only thing I would change would be to get a larger size because it does not close as much as I wanted to across the chest. But I put a decorative Cami underneath and it looks gorgeous.

In the time of COVID, I have been buying and wearing these low-cost wrap dresses almost like robes, but ones I can walk out the front door in.  They are super comfy and flattering and I don't feel like a schlub wearing sweats all day.  I was worried about washing them in the machine and dryer- but on delicate it was fine.  I usually wear a size 4, with a bigger bottom than the top and have gotten one of these in a medium, and on accident, I got one in a large.  Both work; its a wrap dress.  I will say that the medium did seem to shrink a little bit in the wash, the top part is fine for me (I am a B cup), the bottom is fine too, but the overlap on the legs open a little when I sit and cross my legs, which is common for a wrap.  The large leaves a lot of extra fabric.  All of this is to say if you are unsure about what size to get, size up.  Also, the bluish pasley one comes with long bell sleeves which are nice, as long as you are not trying to cook or do anything productive in the dress.

I Love, love, love this dress!!! It's flowy and hugs in all the right places. The way you can wrap it is perfect to fit any body type. Ladies, you will not regret purchasing this dress. I get compliments EVERY time I wear it! Hope this helps!  Oh and the material is super comfy 😍  get the size you normally would get.

I'm not sure what to do with this dress. I read the size charts but something is very wrong. The fabric feels great, it's really soft. I am 5'7, 165pounds, bust 42 inches. waist is about 34 inches. I carry my weight in the tummy area, so I allow size for this and ordered a XL. Well, its huge! It looks like a bath robe. I can wrap the belt around me twice. I'm pretty sure I could wear a medium in it but I'm sending it back. Also, it dips way down in the front.
Very cute dress. Fits and hangs nicely. Very low cut. Purchased a sew on snap for the front.
I am 5ft 2 and 130 pounds this is very long and a little big I order a large I think a medium would have been better but read the size chart and it suggests a large

Fabric is great for weather where I live. The colors shown are not even close to what is shown in the ad. One size up if you buy. Great style and cut harsh colors. Not soft palette as shown in the pics.

评论概述: Great Dress But Not For Me
评论详情: Really wanted to keep this dress but wasn’t as flattering as I would have liked. It is very long so you would have to either wear sandals or boots with a heel. I am 5’8”tall, and a 38C. The L fit well acoss my bust line but you would need to see a snap or hook and eye if you didn’t want to show as much cleavage.

Love the item and the print.  It is slightly small. It barely fits and this is my size, never had a problem with little room.  It you are close to a medium, I would not order a small unless you are at the lower end of small. Also over time (3 washings) the material will shrink--even when very low heat for 2-3 minutes.  So now it doesn't fit.

Pleasantly surprised by the print, fabric and fit. This was not at all bait and switch, I’m very weary of that having had some bad experiences with online clothes shopping. I’m 5’3” and sz10 on top and sz8 on bottom and the large fit perfectly except too long by 4 inches or so, but I have to hem almost all my clothes so this was expected. The green multi print was pretty and detailed just like in the pics and fabric is like a rayon, not a knit tshirt, so don’t expect stretch, and def not sheer or see-through like the other colors. Very decent quality and workmanship, well sewn, no threads sticking out and def looks expensive, no one would think it’s $27

Okay this is a weird review BECAUSE this dress doesn’t fit me well *as a dress*. (5’4”, 145 lbs). It’s a wrap dress and it hangs weird in the chest when I wear it wrapped up. I probably should’ve ordered a large/extra large, HOWEVER, I typically wear it as a kimono, hanging open, with the waist ties tied into loose individual bows, and I have honestly never once worn it without receiving MULTIPLE compliments. One day I wore it to the mall and had people literally shout compliments as I walked around. The print is screened on, so this isn’t an intricate detail situation, but it’s cute and flowy and for the price? A great addition to any bohemian wardrobe. This was the only pic I could find of me in it - not the greatest, but you can see the print well here. Get it! And wear it as a dress or a wrap. Then go walk around your local mall & are what happens. (Seriously, guys. We need to support our malls. They’re dying at breakneck speeds.)

I purchased the 12/14 and it fits well (wish the ties were a tad longer). I'm 64 years old; my height is 5'7" and weigh approximately 175-180 lbs. (not proud of that but I wish more reviewers would give this much detail).  The neckline is low and the front will open up as you walk or sit. If you plan to wear this with just undies, you might be exposing more than you want! That said, the garment is beautiful. I love the colors (I chose the Lake Blue) and the sleeves are fabulous! I hand washed it and put it in the dryer with another load that was 1/2 way dry. I pulled it out at about 10 minutes and hung it up to dry the rest of the way. It came out perfect. I'm very happy with the purchase.

评论概述: I liked the blue better and if the straps were longer ...
评论详情: I thought this dress was gorgeous to be honest. I ordered it in the blue color and the purple color. I liked the blue better and if the straps were longer like the purple straps were I would have kept the blue one but I am sadly returning both. I couldn't tie the straps on the blue dress while they were wrapped around my waste all the way around, but the purple one I could easily tie and had extra length. Seems a bit inconsistent as far as sizing but otherwise it was just gorgeous and I didn't think the fabric was a bad quality. I may re order the blue dress again and see if I can get lucky with longer straps. I ordered the XL 16/18 and I am a 32H up top. I can see how this dress might not work for someone with a larger rib cage especially if the straps are short. But it is worth a try. I am 5'9" and the dress hit about at my ankles. Overall I recommend trying this dress.

Gorgeous "lake blue" print, and fabric drapes very well.  Love the boho styling, but I'm going to have to return the Free Size/Small that I ordered and try the Large, since I don't see an option for Medium.  I am 5'5, 127, 36D, and normally wear a size Small or 6-8 dress, size 4-6 jeans.  The size Small in this dress was the perfect length for me--- might be a tad too long to wear with flat sandals, but perfect for a low or medium heel.  However the sleeves were a tad on the short side, and although the dress did (barely) fit around my back and cover my chest, the material (which has no stretch) gaped open in an odd way at the cleavage area.  I could have my seamstress fix that, or even use a tiny safety pin, but the Small seemed skimpy on the width of the dress too!... there was barely enough fabric for it to wrap all the way around!  So I just have a feeling I'll be happier with a larger size, which I can have altered to fit if need be.  It's such a sensational dress at such a good price, that I don't mind the trouble.  Husband loved it too.

评论概述: Nice for the price, be careful if you don’t want to show much leg
评论详情: This was a good buy! I’m 5’8” and typically buy XL on Amazon.  I’m probably the upper limit of tho can wear this “free size” dress, as the ribbons were a little short for me.  I could only tie it in the back, not all the way around in the front.  Otherwise, the fabric was cute with a retro feel (I chose the “lake blue” option).  This dress is more like a robe, with ribbons attached to each side of the front panels.  The dress closes like a wrap, with the iside ribbon going through a hole on the opposite side of the dress to emerge and tie with the other ribbon.  Overall it feels like something summery you could wear to the beach.  Because it’s a wrap, the slit at the leg goes all the way up, and you have to be careful not to show too much leg!  I also found the length to be great for my height, so I’m not sure it won’t be a little long on shorter women.

The dress doesn’t look exactly like the picture. The print is slightly different and the colors variation is different. It’s not very easy to wear. I had to pin it to keep it shut and important areas.

This dress is so gorgeous and flows so much. It's perfect for summer. I knew it was sheer thus why I purchased it. 2 things though, for why I only chose 4 out of 5 stars. 1, the dress is not as dark as I was hoping for, which is expected from looking at a photo on the internet versus the real thing. I was hoping for a deep royal purple but instead it was more of a fade purple. Second, I normally wear a L/XL, and reading through reviews everyone said 4x. It's actually a bit big. If you're into an extra flow then all is good, I also purchased a belt as shown in the picture which really helped with that and helped with the length. It is a bit lengthy and I'm 5'7", bunching it up with a waste belt really helps though. All in all the fabric is breathable and comfortable, the price is great for a maxi dress, and it's still gorgeous. I want to buy more now lol.

评论概述: Pink, not purple. If ? between sizes order the larger
评论详情: Ordered purple/grey color- this is definitely a megenta pink. While I like pink, purple is my favorite color, so that was disappointing. Still a pretty dress. I kept it. I’m a medium/large in dresses, 5’6” average woman build size 10/12 depending on brand, so I ordered the Large, and it was a smidge small. It wraps all the way around but not enough to keep it decent if the wind blows, and spreads when I sit, so I had to find a way to pull the dress over my thighs to cover the goods. Would recommend wearing shorts underneath, especially if going outside. Very thin comfy fabric, some loose strings but just look like they were missed in finishing touches, not necessarily a problem. All in all worth the money, but won’t be buying other colors unless I lose about 15 pounds (which should put me in a medium but would be a large in this dress). Still wish it was purple

This dress is a nice cool, soft feeling material. I’m usually an XS but the S worked fine for me since it’s a wrap and you can pull it tighter. I’m a slim 5’7 with very long legs and this dress is a rare one that is long enough for me. It layer really nicely. There’s a stray thread or two but it doesn’t seem like anything major and still well worth it for the price. I dress fairly modestly and definitely wouldn’t call this dress sexy as it’s labeled. Maybe if you’re super curvy or have a larger chest. I intend to wear it while traveling in places where females should be more covered.

评论概述: ... I can go without a camisole - I feel better with one
评论详情: It's a cute dress - keep in mind that if you have more than a C cup you will need to where a camisole - I'm in-between B and C and while I can go without a camisole - I feel better with one...  The length is a tad longer than expected - touches the floor - but not bad. Depending on your height - the way it is cut is makes you look pretty tall and lean (I'm 5'6"). Material is nice weight - not see-through. It's a flattering wrap dress and the pattern and color is nice too. Very cute with a pair of cowboy boots.  Overall, I'd say it is a good by for the price. I would recommend hand wash and hang dry (haven't washed yet as just received it - but thinking that is the wisest way to go). Go for it, it is less than $20 - and honestly looks like more.

Although I do really like this dress, I gave it 3 stars and here's why:  Pros - *I got the blue one and it's beautiful. Very colorful and eye catching. *Flowy, light, and comfortable fabric. *Fastest shipping I've had so far! Ordered Sunday, delivered Monday and not even advertised as one day shipping. 👍🏻  Neutral- *The blue color is lighter in person and the turquoise stands out more than in the picture. Just FYI.  Cons- *The stitching isn't the greatest. There are lots of strings hanging out of seams. *This isn't made for short people. I'm 5'3" and I need to hem it by 5.5" so it doesn't completely drag on the ground. *You're not going to see any leg unless you really try hard and it doesn't tie in the front. If you have a small waist you can tie it in the back (which I think looks better) but you're supposed to tie the bow on the side. *The boob part is weird too. Unless you have huge knockers, it's probably going to pucker.  Soooo. I would order this dress again but keep in mind it might need a little work to be perfect for your body.

I am short. I am 5'3" exactly. 160 CM for those using the metric system. I weigh 135. 36DD bust, 30,36. This dress was completely gorgeous on me. It is well made, very feminine, flowing and light. Its lovely and looks like it would cost a pretty penny. It does not feel cheap or coarse. Very soft to the touch and just so pretty! You insert one end of the belt through a loophole on the side of the dress and then wrap the dress around to the side. You can tie the belt behind you or in front of you depending o the length you want the ends of the belt to have. I wore it with flat sandals and it came all the way down to my lower ankles. It is super pretty and very very girlie. The only issue I have is that the neckline is rather deep and hence I would simply wear either a brooch or a little safety pin to clasp it together a bit higher than it is. This dress is great! you wont regret it. BUY IT!

This dress is fabulous but I had to exchange for a size up it is basically junior sizing I Purchased an extra large and kept that one The dress seems much more green and turquoise and vivid and color in person vrs ad photo which appears to be a faded baby blue and natural background. I will mention that the fabric on the extra-large did not lineup perfectly as did the large that I had returned even though I was unhappy with the fabric pattern placement I am still keeping the product. (fabric lacks symmetry) Make an effort to look at customer photos to see the difference from the actual ad photo. Extremely comfortable and happy I purchased it worth the time it took to exchange

评论概述: Pay close attention to how the model is wearing the dress...
评论详情: I thought I would have to insert pleats into the dress, because it arrived way to large I I have a slim but curvy physique I wear a size 6 dress) but apparently you don't just tie it in the front.  Without pleats or wearing it somehow the way the model is wearing it, it would be gigantic on me and not very flattering (like the photo) .  I haven't tried this yet, but upon looking at the picture again, I see that there is a particular art to how this dress is supposed to come together.  So fingers crossed, hopefully I won't have to make any alterations... fingers crossed.

评论概述: Inconsistent sizing, but I love it.
评论详情: So I'm 5' 11" about 152# and the 3xl was a bit snug across the shoulders. So I ordered the 4 xl to try and it was WAY too big. Swimming armpits too big. So I returned it and stuck with the 3 xl. It could be just a crap shoot, I had a different dress by the same brand in a 3xl and it was too big and returned it. I love this dress, I wouldn't be afraid to get it again or another color in another 3xl, thinking sizing might just not be consistent in manufacturing and may end up with a better fit. I wanted a little looser fit so that the wrap would close more over my chest. I don't have much of a bust; if I did, they would fall out of this deep plunge. But, as shown in my second pic, I thought maybe this bra by Victoria's secret would match and fill up the plunge a bit. luckily there is pink in this dress and the bra matches pretty good. V.S. is out of this bra in the blue sadly or I would order it. Pink will work.

Bought this because I want something pretty to wear around the house during the quarantine that I can breathe easily in. It gapes a little in the chest, but I have smaller boobs than the other reviewers. So that is really to be expected. If I were to wear it out I would wear a camisole underneath. Overall, this is a beautiful dress. The material is soft, and feels good on your skin. I haven't been outside in it yet but, so far not see through. It does hit right at the floor on me. (I like that) I am very very pleased with this purchase. I will probably buy again in a different pattern.

评论概述: If you are short and don’t mind the colors not being as shown,  this is perfect
评论详情: The dress is short on me. I am 5’8 and this was advertised as being full length. So I am bummed about that. The color is a little off from the picture as well. I ordered the blue long sleeved and in the photo it appears more light blue colors with light brown/tan. But the dress is much darker making the appearance different when on. So as cute as this dress is it is not what I was expecting and that makes it harder for me to want to wear it. Not the right color and too short makes for the opposite of the look I wanted. I saw all of the awesome reviews so I was really hoping to love this, but I don’t.
Should order size down but is wrap so is OK. Lightweight perfect for vacation, overall good buy for money,nice color too,my is blue
This dress is AMAZING I love it im going to order more of this dress.

It's a robe - - a fancy house dress ,you can not wear this in public unless it's a costume or going to a renaissance fesfival and even then.... I'm 5'3 and it's about 3-4 inches too long on me and you must get a matching bandoo for top because is LOW cut. you also might want to wear something underneath the dress because it opens when you walk and sit. YET despite all this I like it You know when our Grammies wore the old house dresses -button down with side pockets , let's say this is the new improved house dress / without pockets. Maybe Hepburn would have work fhis at home- with fancier material .... Very pretty on, no doubt. But like I said - I could never wear this out in public.

I ordered a large and I’d say it’s a bit tight on my DD bust. The dress is also more open than I expected as it is not an actual dress it is completely open and you actually have to use the string to tie it together to make it a one piece. The fabric is thick and not see through it’s a very nice material and the dress is beautiful. I worry id have a nip slip though due to the open chest but overall it’s a very nice dress. I’d size up if you have a bigger bust and the dress does run a bit small. It’s still beautiful and I can’t wait to wear it.

Very nice dress. Good quality. Bought size large in blue. I’m 42-33-42 fit a little loose in the chest, definitely accentuates  the hourglass shape. Only bad thing is that I possibly received someone else’s return, the dress came rolled up and super wrinkled, also smelled of perfume. Disappointed I paid full price for this. I felt like I pulled this out from goodwill with out the blue tag special lol
Size is correct, wrap style flattering, comfortable and you can wear with flip flops, boots or wedges I adore this dress perfect for any occasion!

Really nice dress. I typically wear a 10/12 and a large in tops as im a 36FF bra and i got the 3x. Fits great. If you are anywhere size 8 an up, go ahead and order the 3x. You can tie the waist so dont worry about it being too big..anything smaller and it likely wont fit well. Shows off your waist and flows over your belly for a flattering fit.  If you have a large bust get ready to show some cleavage. I've seen some people say it didn't fit well in the bust area. That all is a matter of preference. If you have a large chest, this will not be modest on your breasts...I don't mind having a bit of cleavage so that works for me.  Im 5'6 and i wouldn't be able to wear this dress with flats as it touches the ground so I wear it with a pair of wedges. Im glad i took the chance and ordered!!

I am a small medium so I got the medium and it is nothing like how it fits the model. I also bought the belt pictured in the “users who bought this also bought this!” And that belt is huge. I have no idea how they got these to fit the model If you want a loose fit like the picture, order up a size. It’s small and the dress fits the boob area SO. WEIRD. That is the reason I’ll be returning it. I could live with the rest as it is super cute but it can’t be done without showing everybody and their mom your boobs. I’m only a b/c cup and the dress does not cover them. It’s a wonky dress overall and I’m sad that it’s so problematic especially since the other reviews are so good I would upload a picture but it would get taken down for nudity, as my boobs and nipples are on full display in this dress

I purchased an extra large because I am top heavy. I probably could have went with a large because it is way too big around the waist but it's no big deal,I'm good at sewing and can fix that with a nip & tuck here & there! Love the color love everything else about this it is definitely my style I will be purchasing more

评论概述: No need to go a size up.
评论详情: Im 5'2, 60 lbs. I bought an XL because I read in ther comments togo a size up. The dress fit was too long and the chest area was too loose. I felt like my boobs where out too much. I thought the color was more red in the photos looks more pink upon arrival. Im ok with the color pink still looks good on me. I kept it because I have a black jumpsuit that looks good underneath it. So no need to worry about my boobs flashing about The material is thin so that also gels on hot summer days. Next time I'll just get a size down.

I ordered a couple dresses in various colors as well as a different style dress from the same brand. I was a little disappointed in the "flimsiness" feel of the fabric, but it held up well the first time I wore each of them.  And then...I washed them. Spot clean only, for the sake of all that is good in this world. Spot clean and pray it never gets dirty.  I always wash my clothes in cold water, and these dresses I knew would get demolished in a machine. So I washed them in cold water and hung them up to dry.  I ordered large based on my measurements, and now have mediums after a single washing. The fabric is NOT pre-shrunk! I can probably fit into them after losing some weight...hopefully...but I had been looking forward to wearing these on my vacation in a week.

评论概述: The dress wasn't what I expected
评论详情: The dress is nice but the material looks cheap it's not what I expected but I'm going to keep it anyway I like it.
I ordered an XL but as a woman with curves it wasn’t big enough. I could have made it work but i just wish there was one more size up!

This dress is SOOOO PRETTY and it fits really well except for the fact that it's literally about 3 inches too long. I'm 5'3" 125lbs 32C, for reference, and when I wear my tallest boots it still skims the floor. Everything else is perfect except for a few messy seams here and there, but I'm not too picky about that sort of thing, especially not at this price! I might try to hem it, but I'm terrible at sewing! I love this dress though! If you're tall, then definitely get this dress! Update: I wore it to work and got so many compliments! Even the UPS guy said he liked it. Which is awesome because I totally have a crush on him. ;)

Really nice dress- I love the sleeves, the length, the layering, and the fit. I'm 5'9" at 145lbs wearing a size 8, and it's very flattering. I will be wearing a cami underneath because the cleavage does dip a little low to wear to work for a teacher. I pair this with leggings and fringe boots and its one of my favorite outfits in my closet. The only reason why I took a star off is because I was hoping that the pattern would be a bit more brightly colored. Don't get me wrong, it's still a gorgeous dress, but some of the product pictures seemed a little more vibrant. I wish I could give it 4.5/5. Do yourself a favor and get the dress!

评论概述: I'm really in love with this dress
评论详情: I'm really in love with this dress.... I've been fluctuating between 12/14 for a while now.  It fits, I just wish there was a bit more material on the over wrap part.  Just felt a little "short" in material.  The length was great (I'm 5'7", wore with about a 1 1/2" heel and it was perfect.  It's super cute tho.  Festive, flirty, boho, and it was "okay" in covering up and not accentuating my belly which I'm very conscious about.  At some point I want to get the paisley print.  I amy size up to the 16 to see if it has that extra looseness I'm looking for.

This is the second dress I purchased. Ordered this one two sizes bigger just for comfort and lounging purposes. Quick delivery. HOWEVER, it’s not even close to the color I ordered!!! This one (first pic) has very bright teals, golds and pinks. I ordered the multi -blue which has soft blue tones and tans. Not sure yet if I am going to return since I’ll just be wearing around the house. But this was a huge disappointment for $30.

评论概述: Will shrink even if handwashed in cold water!
评论详情: When I received this dress,  I fell in love and it fit perfect!  I was very careful and only handwashed it in cold water and hung it to dry because I didn't want it to possibly shrink.  It shrank anyway!  I don't understand how a piece of clothing can shrink from handwashing in cold water and hung to dry.  I've never had a piece of clothing do that and I handwash several items of my clothing.  So now this beautiful dress that I adored is smaller now to where when I sit down the front of the dress spreads open enough that you can see my panties.  Very disappointed and now I don't know what to do with it.  Either exchange for another one and never wash it or I'll have to find some kind of pants to wear underneath this one that shrank.  Ugh!
It's cute,but description does not match dress,disappointed says Magenta and navy blue,no blue in this dress!

评论概述: One of my boobs hangs out
评论详情: Maybe if I was bigger chested this wouldn't be an issue but I'm flat and the dress doesn't fit well at all. It doesn't fit like the skinny girl. In the picture. I wish I knew how to refund items but I am technically inept. So I guess I'll keep it and try to sell it on fb marketplace
I am a curvy size 14. As it’s a wrap around dress I ordered a 16-18 to make sure it wraps enough… (🤦🏻‍♀️). Runs small. So sad. I love how it forms the curves -if only it would cover more🤷🏻‍♀️

评论概述: The blue isn't the blue online...very bright peacock colors
评论详情: Disappointed in the colors because I was trying to match with my daughter's dress for a holiday card and the colors are nothing like what is online or described.  These are very very bright colors of turquoise and teal.  Not the muted blues and grays I had hoped.  I am debating keeping it.  It will need several placed tacked to keep from having a leg peep show, that's for sure.  I like maxi dresses because I don't want to show off my legs sometimes and this is not a string friendly dress.
It was so soft and very pretty just didn't fir arms were smaller and didn't offer it in a larger size for plus sized ladies just needed a 2 xl
I absolutely love this dress! I wore it for a wedding and it was such a great fit with a pair of cowboy boots!
This dress is awesome. So cool, comfortable, and sexy. I bought the entire outfit! The only negative is that it has no stretch. This was a big yes for me.

评论概述: I took a chance and ordered it based on the great reviews. I am 5'3"
评论详情: There was no where to CHOOSE a size so...I took a chance and ordered it based on the great reviews.  I am 5'3", 140lb, 36C.  This dress is BEAUTIFUL, fabric is soft and colors just as shown.  I was heartbroken that the sleeves and length were too long (even with heels, the hem hit the floor).  It is beyond gorgeous and I did not have the heart to return it.  SOOOO...I washed and DRIED IT ON HOT.  It shrunk...to just my size!  Now, it is very low cut...and a cami is necessary to cover up the girls. But I am so excited to find a reason to wear this with my cowboy boots.

The color and pattern was gorgeous and the length seemed good for heels but when I put it on the actual dress made zero sense. It was styled as a wrap dress with nowhere to wrap. The “belt” part wasn’t sewn correctly

评论概述: Light, cute fabric, not very forgiving
评论详情: Pros: the length was true to the pucture and the fabric is comfortable and seems to hold up. Cons: This fabric does not stretch, at all! so make sure you get the right size. This is made in China which means it runs small and fits tiny people. Order a size up or two. The arms were tight (i have bigger arms though) but again, absolutely no stretch.

评论概述: Gorgeous, I've Gotten So Many Compliments!!
评论详情: I LOVE this dress!! I live in Florida where it's hot outside, cold inside. This dress has been perfect for our warm spring weather as it's nice and lighweight but the sleeves keep me from getting too cold inside. I love the vibrant, boho design, the fit is flirty and feminine, it honestly exceeded my expectations! I wish they had this pattern in another color, I'd buy that too!

Honey This Dress Was Everything I Needed In My Boho / Gypsy Wardrobe. I Loved The Way It Flowed, The Split, The Wrap Around, The Plunging Neck Line. It’s Must Be Made With Goddess Dust Because This Bohemian Lady Felt Alive & Ready For Travel, Dinner, Museums, Dancing Or Anything. Buy It!
Love

I took it on a beach vacation and ended up wearing it more than anything else.  Adds curves where they are needed. (for me) and the flare at the bottom is cut perfectly to add to the (my) body shape  many compliments.  The only thing is that the slit busts open to your vagine in any sort of wind.  Add a few snaps, and perfect. Washed and worn with minimal shrinking and few wrinkles.  I will be buying more. I am 5'9 120lb and the small fit me great.  The medium would have done the trick too.

评论概述: Gorgeous, comfortable, surprisingly well made wrap dress.
评论详情: I was all kinds of pleasantly surprised when I tried this dress on for the first time. The fabric is perfect-light weight, but not sheer or clingy. The colors in person are very lovely, and because of the many different shades in the print, you can really go in many different directions, as far as accessories go. It can be dressed up or down-and, thus far, I've not worn it without receiving a compliment about it (seriously!). My best friend (who has a different body type than I) tried it on, and ordered one for herself before she even took it off! It is quite low cut, so depending on where you are wearing it, some kind of cami might necessary. Really, though, in many ways, it's kind of the perfect dress-casual but very stylish, comfortable and cool in the FL heat. Can you tell I love it? Lol! For the price, give it a try! I think you'll be very pleased.

This dress is beautiful. However it does run slightly small. I was able to make it work with a tank top underneath for my chest and a safety pin at the bottom to keep me from flashing everyone, but I was expecting a much flowy fit then this. It is a true wrap dress so just be aware of that.

评论概述: How to you close the dress with the ties??
评论详情: I love the dress but do not understand how to close the dress? The straps are there but no holes or fastener??

Just ensure that you read the sizing information. I am usually a medium/ size 6 and I think I had to order a 2XL or something like that. But it fits like a dream! I got the white so I do have to wear a slip under it but that's okay by me Also it's pretty long. I'm 5'5" and I have to wear a bit of a heel if I don't want it dragging on the ground. That does take away some of the easy breezy effect that I was going for but it is still a pretty dress
This dress is beautiful and I love the boho style !

I like the way this dress is soft and feminine, I had to order the free size and it fits very well on my 5'2  size 4 frame, the length is perfect to the top of my feet which is always a gamble ordering online usually everything is too long and I trip over it. The only thing is it doesn't fit like the photo around my bust area but I am bigger in that area so I will be wearing a scoop neck cami. One is necessary anyway with the sheerness but mine has to come up a bit higher.

Pros: Light fabric perfect for even the hottest day. Nice shape up top. Unique. Cons: If you are above 5’6” it is not floor length-no matter the size. It doesn’t flow when you walk. Shape of the bottom reminds me of an up side down tulip. I am still trying to decide if I will keep it. I got the one size fits initially and exchanged for large. Fit in the bust is great, but the bottom part is not why I thought it would be. Maybe if I was 2 inches shorter it would look better, idk. I got another dress form this company (the backless one) and it is so pretty and I get compliments all the time. This one though...I think that maybe ordering and trying it is the best way to go with this one.

To help others considering this dress:  I am 5'5", probably between 120-135 pounds (haven't checked in a while), cup size is 34 C-D (depending on bra shape). I bought the Small/Free Size.  I got the free size. It falls to around my ankles (perfect). The bust is a bit loose, but if one ties it correctly (with BOTH straps, using the hole in the fabric intended for the purpose), it stays reasonably well closed. I'm still figuring out the best way to wear it (sports bra seems to work well), but it fits as expected, and I'm happy with it. Beautiful fabric, elegant design, very comfortable.  Update: Okay, I put this dress through a cold hand-wash and hung it to dry ... and I can confirm that it does significantly shrink. It still fits (phew), but if it shrinks again, it won't. So maybe it is best to buy a size up, but I'm not sure.
I loved this dress, but I needed an x-large. It's very, very pretty and well made. I am going to re-order this item ASAP.

Really loved this dress, it was a touch big when I tried it on so I wasn't concerned about washing it. Came out of the washer way too small, not even a full length dress anymore and didn't "close" when wrapping it around and tying it. The arms were too tight too. Couldn't return it since it was washed at that point. I know it's norm for things to shrink, but if it's going to shrink 2-3 sizes down that should be mentioned somewhere in the description.

I am 5 foot 9 and weigh 178 and the large fit. My product came in a zip lock bag and smelled of perfume.  The fit on me is just to the top of my ankle so its not as long  for me. The large just fits  and is not too tight or too big.  I will be ordering another one in a different color. The color is not as vibrant but i am not sure if that because mine was a return  or if it is just that way.

So a few things....the color in person was more like a dark aqua green. Not the blue color you see in the pic. It is an ACTUAL wrap dress, so it literally wraps around your waist with a tie. I wasn't too fond of that bc it seems kinda flimsy like it might fly open or come untied. I'm 5'7" and abt 170 lbs and I got a Medium. It fits a bit loose in the top, but basically fits ok. I am thinking abt returning it bc it just wasn't exactly what I expected.

LOVE THIS DRESS. Very pretty & fit me perfectly. I was worried bout orderin a free size as im quite small & usally even when i order xs sizes they are big on me or still need minor alterations. This wont need any at all. Its the perfect length for me to wear with wedges. Im 5'2, size 2, 120pds, & 36dd chest. The top part wasnt too tight for my bust but i will have to wear a cami under it cuz the neckline plunges a lil. If ur more curvy id suggest goin for ur own size rather than the free size as it may be too small. I was also pleasantly suprised to find the dress goes on like a open wrap robe u tie at the waist. It has a slit for the tie & actually looks seamless when finished. When i noticed before i thought itd look cheaply made & fittin but didnt at all. I highly recommend this item

Ordered a size M(8-10) My weight is 155; Bust 36DD Dress size 8  I love the look and the feel of this dress, however, it shows the girls quite a bit and doesn’t fit properly in this area. I had to use a safety pin to close it so that I got a fit better. No side leg split because it runs slightly big and the split actually fell in the middle of the dress and is covered once the dress is wrapped. The left side appears slightly larger in the hip area and doesn’t lay flush but the right side is ok and lays flat.
I absolutely love this dress it is a little snug in the bus if you’re busty but it’s still works for me. It’s exactly what is describe the color all of it. One of my favorite dresses now.
